DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy Ginsana improve hemoglobin re-oxygenation healthy , recreational sport people assess safety product .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Ginsana Improving Half-time Hemoglobin Re-oxygenation Healthy Recreational Sports People
DOC.criteria: Male female volunteer 18 40 year old Females must test negative pregnancy Recreational athletes accord american college sport medicine ( ACSM ) definition Familiar cycle ergometer exercise methodology Written inform consent accord good clinical practice ( GCP ) local regulation Pre treatment and/or concomitant treatment drug drug may influence trial symptomatology Alcohol drug abuse state clinical trial manual Smokers Known hypertension Known hypercholesterolemia ( moderate/severe ) Female volunteer take oral injectable contraceptive Female volunteer child bear potential use adequate mean birth control , contraceptive pill [ intrauterine device ( IUDs ) ] Pregnancy and/or lactation Liver and/or renal and/or vascular disease Relevant allergy know hypersensitivity investigational drug excipients Participation another clinical trial within last 4 week date inclusion concurrent participation another clinical trial
